title: Stormy Daniels Testifies in Michael Avenatti Fraud Trial
sub_head: Adult-film actress, a prosecution witness, tells jurors former lawyer stole from her
body:
Adult-film actress Stormy Daniels squared off with her former lawyer Michael Avenatti in federal court Thursday, accusing him of stealing hundreds of thousands of dollars as he sought to undermine her credibility by referencing her paranormal beliefs.
Mr. Avenatti told a Manhattan federal jury that Ms. Daniels claimed to have a photographic memory, X-ray vision and the ability to speak to dead people. She also talks to a haunted doll named Susan on a paranormal project she foundedÂ called Spooky Babes, he said.
